verses.text: Yet now \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee, and \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \add which\add* will \w help|strong="H5826"\w* thee; \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; and thou, \w Jesurun|strong="H3484"\w*, whom I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*.

For I will \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* upon him that is \w thirsty|strong="H6771"\w*, and \w floods|strong="H5140"\w* upon the dry \w ground|strong="H3004"\w*: I will \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* upon thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and my \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* upon thine \w offspring|strong="H6631"\w*:

And they shall spring \w up|strong="H6779"\w* \add as\add* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* the \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*, as \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* by the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w courses|strong="H2988"\w*.

One shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and another shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \add himself\add* by the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; and another shall \w subscribe|strong="H3789"\w* \add with\add* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w surname|strong="H3655"\w* \add himself\add* by the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and his \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; I \add am\add* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and I \add am\add* the \w last|strong="H0314"\w*; and \w beside|strong="H1107"\w* me \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And who, as I, shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w*, and shall \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* it, and set it in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* for me, since I \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* the \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? and the things that are \w coming|strong="H0857"\w*, and shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, let them \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* unto them.

\w Fear|strong="H6342"\w* ye not, neither be \w afraid|strong="H7297"\w*: have not I \w told|strong="H8085"\w* thee from that \w time|strong="H0227"\w*, and have \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add*? ye \add are\add* even my \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*. Is \w there|strong="H3426"\w* a \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w beside|strong="H1107"\w* me? yea, \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H6697"\w*; I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not \add any\add*.\f + \fr 44.8 \ft God; I: Heb. rock, etc\f*

¶ They that \w make|strong="H3335"\w* a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w* \add are\add* all of them \w vanity|strong="H8414"\w*; and their delectable \w things|strong="H2530"\w* shall not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*; and they \add are\add* their own \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*; they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not, nor \w know|strong="H3045"\w*; that they may be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.\f + \fr 44.9 \ft delectable: Heb. desirable\f*

Who hath \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* a \w god|strong="H0410"\w*, or \w molten|strong="H5258"\w* a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w* \add that\add* is \w profitable|strong="H3276"\w* for \w nothing|strong="H1115"\w*?

Behold, all his \w fellows|strong="H2270"\w* shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: and the \w workmen|strong="H2796"\w*, they \add are\add* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*: let them all be gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, let them stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w*; \add yet\add* they shall \w fear|strong="H6342"\w*, \add and\add* they shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

The \w smith|strong="H1270"\w* with the \w tongs|strong="H4621"\w* both \w worketh|strong="H6466"\w* in the \w coals|strong="H6352"\w*, and \w fashioneth|strong="H3335"\w* it with \w hammers|strong="H4717"\w*, and \w worketh|strong="H6466"\w* it with the \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* of his \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*: yea, he is \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, and his \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w faileth|strong="H0369"\w*: he \w drinketh|strong="H8354"\w* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and is \w faint|strong="H3286"\w*.\f + \fr 44.12 \ft with the tongs: or, with an axe\f*

The \w carpenter|strong="H2796"\w* stretcheth \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \add his\add* \w rule|strong="H6957"\w*; he marketh it \w out|strong="H8388"\w* with a \w line|strong="H8279"\w*; he \w fitteth|strong="H6213"\w* it with \w planes|strong="H4741"\w*, and he marketh it \w out|strong="H8388"\w* with the \w compass|strong="H4230"\w*, and \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* it after the \w figure|strong="H8403"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, according to the \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*; that it may \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

He heweth him \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, and \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* the \w cypress|strong="H8645"\w* and the \w oak|strong="H0437"\w*, which he \w strengtheneth|strong="H0553"\w* for himself among the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*: he \w planteth|strong="H5193"\w* an \w ash|strong="H0766"\w*, and the \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* doth \w nourish|strong="H1431"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 44.14 \ft strengtheneth: or, taketh courage\f*

Then shall it be for a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* to \w burn|strong="H1197"\w*: for he will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thereof, and \w warm|strong="H2552"\w* himself; yea, he \w kindleth|strong="H5400"\w* \add it\add*, and \w baketh|strong="H0644"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; yea, he \w maketh|strong="H6466"\w* a \w god|strong="H0410"\w*, and \w worshippeth|strong="H7812"\w* \add it;\add* he \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* it a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, and falleth \w down|strong="H5456"\w* thereto.

He \w burneth|strong="H8313"\w* \w part|strong="H2677"\w* thereof \w in|strong="H1119"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; with \w part|strong="H2677"\w* thereof he \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; he \w roasteth|strong="H6740"\w* \w roast|strong="H6748"\w*, and is \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*: yea, he \w warmeth|strong="H2552"\w* \add himself\add*, and \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Aha|strong="H1889"\w*, I am \w warm|strong="H2552"\w*, I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0217"\w*:

And the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* thereof he \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* a \w god|strong="H0410"\w*, \add even\add* his graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*: he falleth \w down|strong="H5456"\w* unto it, and \w worshippeth|strong="H7812"\w* \add it\add*, and \w prayeth|strong="H6419"\w* unto it, and \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me; for thou \add art\add* my \w god|strong="H0410"\w*.

They have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* nor \w understood|strong="H0995"\w*: for he hath \w shut|strong="H2902"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, that they cannot \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; \add and\add* their \w hearts|strong="H3826"\w*, that they cannot \w understand|strong="H7919"\w*.\f + \fr 44.18 \ft shut: Heb. daubed\f*

And none \w considereth|strong="H7725"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, neither \add is there\add* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* nor \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* to \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w part|strong="H2677"\w* of it \w in|strong="H1119"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; yea, also I have \w baked|strong="H0644"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* upon the \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* thereof; I have \w roasted|strong="H6740"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \add it:\add* and shall I \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w residue|strong="H3499"\w* thereof an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*? shall I fall \w down|strong="H5456"\w* to the \w stock|strong="H0944"\w* of a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*?\f + \fr 44.19 \ft considereth…: Heb. setteth to his heart\f*\f + \fr 44.19 \ft the stock…: Heb. that which comes of a tree?\f*

He \w feedeth|strong="H7462"\w* on \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*: a \w deceived|strong="H2048"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* hath turned him \w aside|strong="H5186"\w*, that he cannot \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, nor \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is there\add* not a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* in my right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*?

¶ \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* these, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; for thou \add art\add* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: I have \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee; thou \add art\add* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thou shalt not be \w forgotten|strong="H5382"\w* of me.

I have blotted \w out|strong="H4229"\w*, as a thick \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w*, thy \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, and, as a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto me; for I have \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* thee.

\w Sing|strong="H7442"\w*, O ye \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it:\add* \w shout|strong="H7321"\w*, ye lower \w parts|strong="H8482"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: break \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* into \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*, ye \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, O \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, and every \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* therein: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w glorified|strong="H6286"\w* himself in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, thy \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, and he that \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* all \add things;\add* that stretcheth \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* alone; that spreadeth \w abroad|strong="H7554"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* by myself;

That \w frustrateth|strong="H6565"\w* the \w tokens|strong="H0226"\w* of the \w liars|strong="H0907"\w*, and maketh \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w* \w mad|strong="H1984"\w*; that \w turneth|strong="H7725"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*, and maketh their \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w foolish|strong="H5528"\w*;

That \w confirmeth|strong="H6965"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w performeth|strong="H7999"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of his \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*; that \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Thou shalt be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*; and to the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, Ye shall be \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, and I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the decayed \w places|strong="H2723"\w* thereof:\f + \fr 44.26 \ft decayed…: Heb. wastes\f*
That \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w deep|strong="H6683"\w*, Be \w dry|strong="H2717"\w*, and I will dry \w up|strong="H3001"\w* thy \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*:

That \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w*, \add He is\add* my \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*, and shall \w perform|strong="H7999"\w* all my \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*: even \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Thou shalt be \w built|strong="H1129"\w*; and to the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, Thy foundation shall be \w laid|strong="H3245"\w*.
